text: Cyprian Kizito Lwanga (19 January 1953 – 3 April 2021) was a Ugandan Roman Catholic prelate. He was Archbishop of Kampala from 2006 to his death. From 1996 to 2006, he was Bishop of Kasana–Luweero. ==References== Category:1953 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Roman Catholic archbishops Category:Ugandan Roman Catholic bishops
title: Cyprian Kizito Lwanga
